description: The traditional, lovable circus clown with a big red nose and oversized shoes.
The cunning and witty clown, always ready with a clever trick or a joke.
The silent clown who speaks volumes through gestures and expressions.
The goofy, zany clown that brings a smile with their innocent comedy.
The rough and tumble clown who's at home in the wild west of the rodeo arena.
The agile and acrobatic clown, often involved in romantic misadventures.
